scripts.publish:core: npm run build && node scripts/convert-deps-for-publish.js publish biome-doc-lint eslint-plugin-docs && node scripts/publish-packages.js core infrastructure distribution commander && node scripts/convert-deps-for-publish.js local biome-doc-lint eslint-plugin-docs
scripts.publish:plugins: npm run build && node scripts/convert-deps-for-publish.js publish biome-doc-lint eslint-plugin-docs && node scripts/publish-packages.js biome-doc-lint eslint-plugin-docs && node scripts/convert-deps-for-publish.js local biome-doc-lint eslint-plugin-docs
scripts.publish:cli: npm run build && node scripts/publish-packages.js cli
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:plugins && npm run publish:cli && npm run publish:meta
